senses.sense_definition: An Italian coffee-based beverage made from espresso and steamed or frothed milk, or a cup of this drink.

examples.text: I usually drink a hot <w>cappuccino</w> with breakfast.
She ordered a large <w>cappuccino</w> and a slice of cake.

senses.sense_definition: A medium- to dark-brown colour resembling the coffee drink.

examples.text: The designer chose a warm <w>cappuccino</w> for the living room walls.
Her new leather bag is a rich shade of <w>cappuccino</w>.
